 [Miro]
](https://miro.com/app/dashboard?link=logo-header)

[Miro]
Impress your team with meetings run in Miro
Lead interesting meetings and presentations with less PowerPoint slides and more interactivity — even with hybrid teams. Start fresh with a [professional meeting template](https://miro.com/app/dashboard/?templatesPickerPreselectedCategory=meetings_and_workshops&link=text-hero), and take advantage of Miro's unique features and format.
[

Create a meeting board
 
](https://miro.com/app/dashboard/?templatesPickerPreselectedCategory=meetings_and_workshops&link=cta-button-hero)

[Create a meeting board ➤](https://miro.com/templates/meetings-and-workshops/?link=cta-button-hero)

[Meeting templates]

Use sleek, organized templates. Upgrade your agenda and choose from [best in class meeting frameworks](https://miro.com/app/dashboard/?templatesPickerPreselectedCategory=meetings_and_workshops&link=text-1-1).
[Use frames for presentations]

Keep everything in one place. Upload slides, designs, or docs [to a meeting board](https://help.miro.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017731013-Uploading-files-to-boards/?link=text-1-2).
[Get feedback with voting]

Ask for feedback with voting. Get feedback while staying on track using a Miro's [powerful voting app](https://help.miro.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017572274-Voting&link=text-1-3#h_01FHZ1M1C9WTC028DSQ8A4R7R8).
[Celebrate with reactions]

Celebrate the good with reactions. [Use Miro reactions](https://help.miro.com/hc/en-us/articles/360021249320-Reactions&link=text-1-4) to show the team some love.
Better meetings and workshops are why 99% of Fortune 100
companies use Miro
[
 [Fortune 100 companies using Miro]
](https://miro.com/)

Happy collaborating,
The Miro Team

collaboration.

‌ ͏ ‌
[
 [Miro]
](https://miro.com/app/dashboard?link=logo-header)

Bring your team to the board and start collaborating
[

Invite your team
 
](https://miro.com/app/dashboard/?inviteModal.visible=true?link=cta)

[
 [Invite your team]
](https://miro.com/app/dashboard/?inviteModal.visible=true?link=cta)

Miro gives everyone on your team the tools they need to connect
and co-create. Simply send invites to get your team working
together on Miro.
[
 [Share Button animation]
](https://miro.com/app/dashboard/?inviteModal.visible=true?link=cta)

We make it easy for you to send out invites and add collaborators
via email, Slack, and Gmail integrations. Just open up your Miro
board and click on Share in the upper-right corner.
[Hear from Under Armour and Deloitte]

Bonus: Hear from [Under Armour](https://miro.com/blog/under-armour-virtual-conference-room/?utm_source=Guru&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=Under-armoud-blog&utm_content=cta) and [Deloitte](https://youtu.be/54mNyLIyjaU) on how bringing teams into Miro improved collaboration.
[

Start collaborating
 
](https://miro.com/app/dashboard/?inviteModal.visible=true?link=cta)

Happy collaborating,
The Miro Team

You can update your profile settings to change [notifications](https://click.e.miro.com/?qs=90f140ed635850cba4bc956ecc866aaf783d06f96c0bc5e2711b70930dce9b4af76ab66061dd27a0bcfc06e266aa635fef12a3b6c3cf0d9061bd85499a62e653), preferred [language](https://click.e.miro.com/?qs=90f140ed635850cb4e207213ad7ad40daf4fd9bbdc59cef11d6d915eeaa807d90ca57fcde6fb1bd29c0b66b8f3493e796eec35ee4dc9845f3752ebccd9e582d5), or [unsubscribe](https://click.e.miro.com/?qs=90f140ed635850cbf276ddf28276ab26b17027d0f661ce0275e68a0ca15f06d9459f267274eb23dc503be8d7bd58f1fed05a3bad6bfd2b8f0c8f4864f6c64cfd).

Assunto: How's Your FlutterFlow Journey Going? —  A Message from FlutterFlow's CEO
Mensagem:
Our mission, "Help the world build great products," is driven by the creativity and ambition of users like you! We'd love your feedback.

https://flutterflow.io ONBOARDING

João Lucas Pereira,

We hope your first week using FlutterFlow was nothing short of a success. Our mission, "Help the world build great products," is driven by the creativity and ambition of users like you. We're here to turn your ideas into reality, and are thrilled to see what you'll build using FlutterFlow!

We've shared some resources and tutorials to help you along, and now, we would greatly appreciate it if you could share your experience and complete a 3 question survey (https://forms.gle/sYRvnzyWDKro1tjW9) . Your feedback is crucial in shaping FlutterFlow to better serve your needs.

Remember, our support team and the FlutterFlow Community (https://community.flutterflow.io/) are here to assist you. Whether you have questions or need guidance, we're just a message away.

💜
Abel and Alex
Co-Founders of FlutterFlow

============================================================
FlutterFlow Logo

Build Different.

You are receiving this email because you signed up on ** flutterflow.io (https://flutterflow.io)
** YouTube (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5LueiosDVInA6yXE_38i9Q)
** Twitter (http://www.twitter.com/flutterflow)
** LinkedIn (https://www.linkedin.com/company/flutterflow)
** Website (https://www.flutterflow.io)
© 2024 FlutterFlow, Inc.

Our mailing address:
883 N Shoreline Blvd, #B220,
Mountain View, CA 94043

Want to change how you receive these emails?
You can ** update your preferences (https://flutterflow.us2.list-manage.com/profile?u=544d5264f5e71e5fa379d41f5&id=43c1c0eebb&e=b29160215a&c=5a10942890)
or ** unsubscribe from this list (https://flutterflow.us2.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=544d5264f5e71e5fa379d41f5&id=43c1c0eebb&t=b&e=b29160215a&c=5a10942890)
.

Assunto:
[tomorrow] Learn How to Build & Adapt Processes Faster with Camunda
 AI - save your seat!
Mensagem:
See Camunda's latest AI features in action during this live webinar.

Adapt Faster with Camunda: Embrace ever-changing business requirements with AI infused end-to-end orchestration (https://hs.camunda.com/e3t/Ctc/I4+113/cxGRJ04/MVGFWYPvJd-W6dvd-52vvr01W8QwHkG5flQwSN824DB03prCCW8wLKSR6lZ3phW6-Sc842n_2gjW8sG63s7brgm6W6-Sn-83vwTNBW2FsND07nK5ZxN2dWgDRsyMSpW5L8nGw5sm1MMW6vyngY4mtQ3mW2MYLJd5vWqj-N2vkgMN8nFqxW4vDvjw2rw-qnW6-CJ6J15Fd6XW5sXRbj3TS3dgW7Xsqyv2PpCJ9W4C_wKv7Wvx4pW1-tBWz2Kd-bcN4q4NqjxP6gkW2WYLZ76R_kBYVbMZj72LjDRGW5q0jFn1YKwmxN2k48YTlshMXN9jl4ZyQhG2DW40jBCN9c2V0-W2cxXzj1DLq6BW1bKCzT8P4SmgW4NHRQR1fv3c2W38zHML7KhhvnW7r36qB4PR9bwW8bh75P8Wsksqf7RkBJz04 )

Dive into Camunda’s newest AI features and discover how they enable you to create and adapt your processes faster so you can stay ahead of disruptive competition and meet evolving business demands.

Register Now
(https://hs.camunda.com/e3t/Ctc/I4+113/cxGRJ04/MVGFWYPvJd-W6dvd-52vvr01W8QwHkG5flQwSN824DB03prCCW8wLKSR6lZ3phW6-Sc842n_2gjW8sG63s7brgm6W6-Sn-83vwTNBW2FsND07nK5ZxN2dWgDRsyMSpW5L8nGw5sm1MMW6vyngY4mtQ3mW2MYLJd5vWqj-N2vkgMN8nFqxW4vDvjw2rw-qnW6-CJ6J15Fd6XW5sXRbj3TS3dgW7Xsqyv2PpCJ9W4C_wKv7Wvx4pW1-tBWz2Kd-bcN4q4NqjxP6gkW2WYLZ76R_kBYVbMZj72LjDRGW5q0jFn1YKwmxN2k48YTlshMXN9jl4ZyQhG2DW40jBCN9c2V0-W2cxXzj1DLq6BW1bKCzT8P4SmgW4NHRQR1fv3c2W38zHML7KhhvnW7r36qB4PR9bwW8bh75P8Wsksqf7RkBJz04 )

During this webinar we'll discuss how process orchestration uniquely enables you to realize the full promise of AI to truly supercharge efficiency, productivity, and continuous improvement across your entire enterprise. Join us live and discover how you can:

- Adapt faster with Camunda Copilot and preview Camunda’s overarching vision for AI
- Speed up form creation with an AI-assisted Form Builder
- Orchestrate generative AI tools and services such as OpenAI, Azure Open AI, and Hugging FaceChatGPT
- Leverage your process execution data for machine learning
- Intelligently route customer inquiries with an AI-enabled process blueprint
- Find the Camunda information you need with AI-powered search
